text: Need Aria Perez for Bed Bath N' Table campaign. Budget around $10,049, looking for 1 x Radio interview, 3 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Brand photoshoot, 2 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Store opening. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
